attributes.action: To force all fast food chains with over 300 separate locations, to offer delivery. Including McDonalds, Burger King and KFC.
attributes.additional_details:
The government will evaluate all the fast food restaurants in the UK, and they will give all of those with over 300 locations 12 months notice until they must offer a delivery service.

This would be regulated by the government to prevent excessive delivery charges, and this will also help to bring food delivery into a more regulated environment in terms of keeping an eye on delivery drivers insurance and their vehicles.
